appsgate.lig.light.actuator.philips.HUE.impl
Class PhilipsHUEImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.light.actuator.philips.HUE.impl.PhilipsHUEImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CoreColorLightSpec, CoreObjectSpec
public class PhilipsHUEImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CoreColorLightSpec, CoreObjectSpec

This class is the AppsGate implementation of ColorLightSpec for Philips HUE technology

Since:
May 22, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

notifyChanges

public NotificationMsg notifyChanges(java.lang.String varName,
                                     java.lang.String value)
This method uses the ApAM message model. Each call produce a TemperatureNotificationMsg object and notifies ApAM that a new message has been released.

Returns:
nothing, it just notifies ApAM that a new message has been posted.
